statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 80;
SELECT wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE temperature <= 10 AND precipitation >= 5;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY humidity DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity), MIN(wind_speed) FROM weather_data;
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity BETWEEN 50 AND 70 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM weather_data;
SELECT date, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(wind_speed) AS avg_wind_speed FROM weather_data;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE wind_speed > 10 ORDER BY humidity ASC, temperature DESC
SELECT date, SUM(temperature) AS total_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM weather_data GROUP BY date HAVING total_temperature > 500 ORDER BY date
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND consumption > 100 ORDER BY consumption DESC
SELECT date, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY date HAVING total_records > 5 ORDER BY date
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY wind_speed ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND wind_speed <= 10
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC, temperature ASC, humidity DESC, wind_speed ASC
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 60 AND wind_speed < 10
SELECT timestamp, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT timestamp, temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 20 OR wind_speed > 15 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT location, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY humidity ASC
SELECT id, location, usage FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM ForecastData WHERE prediction_date = '2022-01-01' AND predicted_energy > 100 ORDER BY predicted_energy DESC
SELECT utility_name, contact_person FROM Utilities
SELECT location, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE time_stamp >= '2022-01-01' AND time_stamp <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT location, predicted_energy FROM ForecastData WHERE prediction_date = '2022-02-15'
SELECT id, utility_name, address FROM Utilities WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT location, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT date, temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 60;
SELECT id, utility_name FROM utilities WHERE contact_info IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM data_sources ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC, temperature, humidity DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 70 ORDER BY temperature DESC, date LIMIT 5;
SELECT utility_name, location, contact_info FROM utilities WHERE contact_info IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM forecast_history WHERE forecasted_consumption > actual_consumption ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT source_name, type FROM data_sources WHERE description LIKE '%weather%' ORDER BY source_name ASC;
